attributes.action: Grand Iraqis who fled Iraq after 2003 with the right to come and work in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Iraqis have suffered from occupation of Iraq in 2003 and now living in Syria and Jordan illegally just to stay a life, should be treated as war victims and should be given the right to come and start new life in UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
